bundle-none-tutorial-padogrid.title: PadoGrid Tutorial
bundle-none-tutorial-padogrid.description: This tutorial bundle covers PadoGrid essentials.

bundle-none-tutorial-docker-haproxy.title: Configuring HAProxy for TLS Termination - Mosquitto, Grafana, Prometheus, Hazelcast Management Center
bundle-none-tutorial-docker-haproxy.image_label: Configuring HAProxy for TLS Termination - Mosquitto, Grafana, Prometheus, Hazelcast Management Center
bundle-none-tutorial-docker-haproxy.description: This bundle walks through steps involved in configuring a TLS termination proxy to secure Mosquitto, Grafana, Prometheus, and Hazelcast Management Center using HAProxy.

bundle-none-imdg-benchmark-tests.title: IMDG Product Benchmark Tests
bundle-none-imdg-benchmark-tests.description: This bundle provides step-by-step instructions for creating a test environment and conducting benchmark tests on IMDG products.

bundle-none-app-simulator.title: Data Feed Simulator
bundle-none-app-simulator.description: This bundle includes a data feed simulator for generating continous numerical data for MQTT and Hazelcast.

bundle-none-template.title: Generic (none) Bundle Template
bundle-none-template.description: This bundle serves as a template for creating a new generic onlne bundle.
